name: 30 Days until Wedding Bells
description:
Hi everyone, this is Nicole here. This is our first jam entry and first Ace Game Jam entry ever. I hope you enjoy it. We had a ton of difficulties even getting it out so we're glad that we got there.

===

Michael Tan is your average post-grad student who's tentatively looking for a job in his degree. While working as a dish washer, he comes into an existential crisis about his role in life and his wife's role in his. Even though he knows she makes him happy, he really wonders if it's the right course of action. 

With the help of some friends, maybe. Just maybe. Maybe he'll figure it all out? He's got thirty days until the unique mammoth bells in his town ring true, so now may be a good time it out before it's too late.

===

Content Warning: General transphobia

30 Days to Wedding Bells is a short Interactive Fiction story originally written in Ren'py and ported to Twine. It is playable here in browser, with a potential Windows, Mac and Linux release if there's enough interest. This was made in twenty eight days for the Ace Game Jam on Janurary 21, 2019.
